name: Broccoli Pesto Cavatelli
steps: Cut broccoli into florets and peel stems. Roughly chop into small pieces and set aside.
Bring a pot of salted water to a boil and boil broccoli until soft. Drain and season generously with salt and pepper.
Pull apart sausage into tiny pieces. Heat oil in a small pan and add sausage with chili peppers and a clove of crushed garlic.
Saute another clove of crushed garlic and chili flakes in oil in a new pan for about 3 minutes. Add brocolli once steamed and mash well or blend.
Cook pasta in water for a couple minutes and add to broccoli. Toss with sausage to finish cooking.
